txt.en: Cenric is on the field of victory after the Battle of Helm's Deep, not far from Aragorn and Théoden.
'I remember the defence of the Deeping Wall. This is how it was...'

Cenric is on the field of victory after the Battle of Helm's Deep, not far from Aragorn and Théoden.
Talk to Cenric on the field of victory after the battle of Helm's Deep
'I remember the defence of the Hornburg. This is how it was...'

'My family and I will never forget how you helped us during the long night of Isengard's attack, [placeholder]! We are forever grateful to you, as is all of Rohan!\n\n'May your further adventures prove as beneficial to all you encounter, my friend!'
Cenric will not forget the ordeal of night at Helm's Deep.
Talk to Cenric and complete 'Storied Tale: Helm's Dike'

'I will not forget the long night, [placeholder]. Many are the tales we will tell of the great battle at Helm's Deep!'\n\n<rgb=#00FF00>If you did not complete the Storied Tales while playing through Volume III Book 13, this quest will give you the opportunity to play them. Successfully completing a Storied Tale will add it to the West Rohan Reflecting Pool at Dunharrow.</rgb>
Talk to Cenric and complete 'Storied Tale: The Deeping Wall'
'I remember the defence of Helm's Dike. This is how it was...'
Storied Tales of Helm's Deep
